channel.title: Client help please
channel.description:
k i run the server
then i run the client the client opens and the client gets stuck on connecting to update server
and on the run app i get this error
error_game_js5io
i have the right cache its cache508 or the other way around i dont remeber
and yes i have the server up
do i have to make the client to my server in order for it to work or something im confused because the error means the server isnt up or the cache is messed up but it isnt its in the right place it has rs2 and everytihng
someoen please help me

item.title: Client help please
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

Is the client connected to your server? Test it, change it to 0.0.0.0 and then try it if not.
